703755f-a.text:
Columbia Street, east side, south from the N.E. corner of Creamer and Columbia Streets, showing at the aforementioned corner the Berg Varnish Co. Inc. building. Beyond it occupying the block between Creamer and Bay Street is the H. Kohnstamm and Co. building. They are manufacturers of dry colors.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
703755f-a.folder: Columbia Street & Creamer Street, Brooklyn, NY
